name: Leave (Phạm Phú Phi Phương)
description:
* The story in the game is fictional

A short sad and horror story.  The main character is a boy who lost his mom early, he had a friend, but many years ago he forgot about that friend and...

You should click slowly for the best experience (should be click after sound effects and  are done)

Thank for playing.

Hope you enjoy.
